Class CaesarBreaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • week1.CaesarBreaker

  • public class CaesarBreaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Break the Caesar Cipher using the letter frequencies.

    2015-11-20
    Author:
    Pawel Daniluk

      • getKey

        public int getKey(java.lang.String msg)
        Method for finding encryption key, based on most common occurences of letter in encrypted msg, assuming that it represents 'e';
        Parameters:
        msg - encrypted string for which key is to be found
        Returns:
        encryption key for msg

      • decryptOneKey

        public java.lang.String decryptOneKey(java.lang.String encrypted)
        Method for decrypting meg, encrypted with one key.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - string to be decrypted
        Returns:
        decrypted msg with key guessed

      • halfOfString

        public java.lang.String halfOfString(java.lang.String message,
                                     int start)
        This method should return a new String that is every other character from message starting with the start position.
        Parameters:
        message - string to be split in half
        start - starting point to begin splitting
        Returns:
        string containing every other letter from input

      • mix

        public java.lang.String mix(java.lang.String s0,
                            java.lang.String s1)
        Helper function for merging string split with halfOfString
        Parameters:
        s0 - substring starting from index 0
        s1 - substring starting from index 1
        Returns:
        original string split with halfOfString

      • decryptTwoKeys

        public java.lang.String decryptTwoKeys(java.lang.String encrypted)
        This method attempts to determine the two keys used to encrypt the message, prints the two keys, and then returns the decrypted String with those two keys.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - string encrypted with encryptTwoKeys
        Returns:
        decrypted string

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String encrypted,
                                int key0,
                                int key1)
        Decrypt text encrypted with two keys.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - text to be decrypted
        key0 - first encryption key
        key1 - second encryption key
        Returns:
        string decrypted using provided keys
